channel.title: Posts on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Home

item.title: Basic terminology in Google Cloud Platform
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)
item.description: This is the first part of GCP’s series. In this article, you will familiar with some of the basic terminology used in Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Topics to cover: Google Cloud Projects and networks Internal IP and External IP DNS resolution for internal IP DNS resolution for external IP Cloud DNS Firewall Route Google Cloud Google Cloud consists of regions (icons in blue), points of presence or PoPs (dots in blue), a global private network (blue lines) and services.

item.title: Deploy Azure Bastion as Code with Terraform
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)

item.title: First post!
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)
item.description: Yeah. This is real. My blog is live ðŸ˜Š A long time ago, I would like to make a blog to share my experience and my point of view but I’m not able to arrange myself to do that. Recently, I viewed some technical blogs hosted by GitHub and they are inspiring me on how to build fastly a blog with GitHub pages. And that I want to share with you in this article.
